enigma

Class ExampleEnigma

  • Object
    • Enigma
      • ExampleEnigma

  • public class ExampleEnigma
extends Enigma
    This version of the Enigma isn't really suitable for any serious use however it may have some demonstration use to get started quickly.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ExampleEnigma()
      Use this constructor if you don't even care what the rotor settings are.
      ExampleEnigma(char pos1, char pos2, char pos3)
      This constructor creates a JEnigma machine using Rotors I, II and III, an empty plugboard and reflector B.

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from class Enigma

        configure, execute, main, rotateRotors, setRotorPositions

      • Methods inherited from class Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • ExampleEnigma

        public ExampleEnigma(char pos1,
                     char pos2,
                     char pos3)
        This constructor creates a JEnigma machine using Rotors I, II and III, an empty plugboard and reflector B. The char parameters are the starting positions for the rotors - essentially the key.
        Parameters:
        pos1 - A char 'A' to 'Z' which gives the starting position of the first rotor.
        pos2 - A char 'A' to 'Z' which gives the starting position of the second rotor.
        pos3 - A char 'A' to 'Z' which gives the starting position of the third rotor.

      • ExampleEnigma

        public ExampleEnigma()
        Use this constructor if you don't even care what the rotor settings are.
